title: 75% OFF NordVPN Coupons + Cashback February 2026
text: Earn up to 40% Cashback 75% Off NordVPN Pricing 73% Off 2-Year VPN Plan at NordVPN 70% Off 2-Year Plan and Receive 4 Months at No Cost 73% Discount on NordVPN's 2-Year Plan 59% Off 1-Year Plan at NordVPN Save 25% When You Choose the 3-Year Subscription Plan Up to 63% Off Online Security Packages for 1-Year 15% Off with NordVPN's Student & Employee Discount Try NordVPN Risk-Free for 30 Days Missed these coupons? Keep an eye out as they might come back Frequently asked questions about NordVPN The longer the better A smart way to save on NordVPN is by choosing a longer plan. A monthly subscription starts from $12.99, but a two-year plan can bring the cost down to $3.09 per month. That is a huge difference and works out to around 76% off. If you plan to use NordVPN regularly, we advise you to subscribe to the longer plans. On top of that, add a verified NordVPN promo code on the plan to bring the price even lower. 15% discount on NordVPN Students, graduates, teachers, healthcare workers, military members, and first responders can get 15% off any NordVPN plan after a quick check with Student Beans. Once you are verified, you'll receive a coupon code right away. For the best savings, use this offer on a plan that is already on sale. Using a use coupon on NordVPN Choose your plan and go to the checkout page. Click "Got a coupon?" to reveal the discount field. Enter your coupon as it is, including hyphens or special characters. Hit "Apply." You'll see the discount in the order summary. Ready to express your opinion about the seller? You can write a review for your approved transactions. About NordVPN NordVPN is a leading VPN provider trusted across the industry for secure, high-speed, and privacy-focused services. They offer personal VPN plans, business and team solutions, and advanced add-ons like threat protection. Not sure which plan is right for you, or need help setting things up? NordVPN’s customer service is available 24/7 through live chat and email at support@nordvpn.com. Their Support Center also has step-by-step guides with accompanying images. NordVPN's money-back guarantee One of our favorite ways to save with NordVPN is by using their 30-day money-back guarantee. It’s basically a free trial that gives you full access to every feature, including their huge server network and security tools. We’ve tested this ourselves and found that we have plenty of time to check connection speeds and see how it works on different devices. If it’s not the right fit, reach out to support within 30 days, and you’ll get your full refund.
